name: Squirrel's Happy Land of Happiness
description:
Alpha 1.1 And A Half yaaaaaayyyy

Hello, Question Squirrel! Can you say hello? [No.]

If you want the full story of Question Squirrel, go here: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/stclairatron-2000/

This is the first game I have ever made, because it was only a matter of time until Scratch failed me and I moved on to more sophisticated platforms; Unity.

This is still a heavy WIP.

There is no shop yet, not yet. Also, I didn't make this clear in the game, but to pause if you're using the keyboard it's the escape key and if you're playing on an Xbox controller it's the button in the middle with the three lines on it.

(Supports Xbox wireless controller)
